title: Who Is Jason Alexander’s Wife? Daena Title’s Job & Relationship History
description: Discover Jason Alexander's lasting love story with wife Daena Title, exploring their creative partnership and over 40 years of marriage. The post Who Is Jason Alexander’s Wife? Daena Title’s Job & Relationship History appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Vritti Johar
excerpt: Discover the love story of Jason Alexander and his wife, spanning over four decades of marriage and creative careers.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Curious about Jason Alexander and his longtime wife? The actor and his partner have shared over 40 years of marriage filled with love, creativity, and memorable milestones. From their whirlwind romance in the early 1980s to raising two talented sons and navigating life together, their relationship has been one of partnership and support. Here’s everything you need to know about his wife and the enduring love story they share. Who is Jason Alexander married to? Jason Alexander, best known for his role as George Costanza on Seinfeld, has been married to Daena Title since May 31, 1982. The couple has shared over 40 years together, raising two sons, Gabriel and Noah Greenspan. Both sons have pursued creative careers, with Daena focusing on art and Jason thriving in acting. Alexander often reflects on their relationship with humor and warmth. He fondly recalls their first date in New York City, where Bruce Willis was their waiter, and John Goodman tended bar. Their bond has grown through milestones like Alexander’s Times Square proposal and their ongoing support for each other’s careers. What is Daena Title’s job? Daena Title is a feminist and expressionist visual artist (via PEOPLE). Her work, often inspired by modern female icons, includes colorful, figurative paintings that critique societal expectations of women. Title has exhibited her artwork across the United States, including prominent galleries in New York, Los Angeles, and Wisconsin. Before delving into her art career, Daena earned a degree in art history and theater studies from Wellesley College in 1979 and explored acting and writing in Manhattan. She later transitioned fully into visual arts, creating a body of work that reflects her advocacy for gender equality and individuality. Jason Alexander and Daena Title’s relationship history Jason Alexander and Daena Title’s relationship blossomed quickly after their star-studded first date at Cafe Central in New York. Within weeks, the two moved in together, and after several romantic proposals—including a Times Square billboard—Title accepted Alexander’s offer of marriage. They exchanged vows in a modernized Jewish ceremony in 1982. Over the years, the couple has prioritized family and personal growth. They raised their two sons, who have followed creative paths in acting and voice work. Title even appeared in the iconic finale of Seinfeld, a fitting nod to her husband’s career, cementing their collaborative spirit in both personal and professional endeavors.

Curious about Jason Alexander and his longtime wife? The actor and his partner have shared over 40 years of marriage filled with love, creativity, and memorable milestones. From their whirlwind romance in the early 1980s to raising two talented sons and navigating life together, their relationship has been one of partnership and support.

Here’s everything you need to know about his wife and the enduring love story they share.

Who is Jason Alexander married to?

Jason Alexander, best known for his role as George Costanza on Seinfeld, has been married to Daena Title since May 31, 1982. The couple has shared over 40 years together, raising two sons, Gabriel and Noah Greenspan. Both sons have pursued creative careers, with Daena focusing on art and Jason thriving in acting.

Alexander often reflects on their relationship with humor and warmth. He fondly recalls their first date in New York City, where Bruce Willis was their waiter, and John Goodman tended bar. Their bond has grown through milestones like Alexander’s Times Square proposal and their ongoing support for each other’s careers.

What is Daena Title’s job?

Daena Title is a feminist and expressionist visual artist (via PEOPLE).

Her work, often inspired by modern female icons, includes colorful, figurative paintings that critique societal expectations of women. Title has exhibited her artwork across the United States, including prominent galleries in New York, Los Angeles, and Wisconsin.

Before delving into her art career, Daena earned a degree in art history and theater studies from Wellesley College in 1979 and explored acting and writing in Manhattan. She later transitioned fully into visual arts, creating a body of work that reflects her advocacy for gender equality and individuality.

Jason Alexander and Daena Title’s relationship history

Jason Alexander and Daena Title’s relationship blossomed quickly after their star-studded first date at Cafe Central in New York. Within weeks, the two moved in together, and after several romantic proposals—including a Times Square billboard—Title accepted Alexander’s offer of marriage. They exchanged vows in a modernized Jewish ceremony in 1982.

Over the years, the couple has prioritized family and personal growth. They raised their two sons, who have followed creative paths in acting and voice work. Title even appeared in the iconic finale of Seinfeld, a fitting nod to her husband’s career, cementing their collaborative spirit in both personal and professional endeavors.
